name: AMD Ryzen 9 9950X
description: AMD flagship Zen 5 CPU with 16 cores/32 threads and 5.7GHz boost. Exceptional multi-threaded performance with industry-leading efficiency and AM5 platform longevity.

reviews.review_text: Multi-threaded monster. Compiles faster than anything.
Efficiency is insane. Cool and quiet under load.
AM5 platform gives years of upgrade path.
